titles.title: Expressing support for the proclamation of a "National Cybersecurity Awareness Month".
Expressing support for the proclamation of a "National Cybersecurity Awareness Month".

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Cybersecurity and Infrastructure Protection.

Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

Referred to the Committee on Homeland Security, and in addition to the Committee on Science, Space, and Technology, for a period to be subsequently determined by the Speaker, in each case for consideration of such provisions as fall within the jurisdiction of the committee concerned.

bill.summary: This resolution expresses support for the proclamation of a National Cybersecurity Awareness Month.
